summary: I got tired of buying spell tomes for spells already known.
descriptionHtml:
I got tired of buying spell tomes for spells already known.

[b]This mod requires SKSE: http://skse.silverlock.org/[/b]

This mod changes the tome\'s name to indicate if it\'s a known spell. e.g. For a known spell such as \"Fury\" the associated spell tome will list as \"Spell Tome (known): Fury\" rather than \"Spell Tome: Fury\".

Vanilla spells only for now
English only for now

WARNING: I also discovered that this mod will not uninstall clean :-/
It alters the name of the item and that alteration becomes part of the save.
author: jbezorg
